remarks: Expansion of the codomain of a homomorphism.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2015.)
statement:
reslmhm2.u $e |- U = ( T |`s X ) $.
reslmhm2.l $e |- L = ( LSubSp ` T ) $.
reslmhm2b $p |- ( ( T e. LMod /\ X e. L /\ ran F C_ X ) -> ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) <-> F e. ( S LMHom U ) ) ) $.
